verses.name: Hebrews 13:19
verses.text: But I beseech you the rather to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:20
verses.text: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant,

verses.name: Hebrews 13:21
verses.text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.name: Hebrews 13:22
verses.text: And I beseech you, brethren, suffer the word of exhortation: for I have written a letter unto you in few words.
